snippet.title: Rising Islands - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rising Islands is on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/452450/

Rising Islands is a game where you have to combine fast-paced movement with quick thinking.
Jump, shift, grind and dash toward your goal. Use your Dimension shift ability and see the world change around you.

-

Rising Islands is an Adventure game with a dimensionbending twist developed by Lone Hero Studios.

Find out more about Rising Islands:
Website: http://www.loneherostudios.com/rising-islands/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Rising-Islands-1517702485143754/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LoneHeroStudios
Google+: https://plus.google.com/100031871043047946886
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/rising-islands
